KoJc2tTrdFQ.title: You waive your right to a class action

tosdr.tldr: By agreeing to Instagram's terms, you agree that you can only bring any claim against them on your own behalf. You waive your right to being part of a class action, or participating in claims brought in any representative capacity.

at-their-discretion-with-notice.title: Terms may be changed at their discretion, but they will notify you before.

tosdr.case: user is notified a week or more in advance
tosdr.tldr: They can change the terms at their discretion, but they will notify the user in reasonable advance by email or by posting them online. However, your use of the service constitutes acceptance of the changes in the terms without explicit consent.

wy9QcF5zQII.title: Very broad copyright license on your content

tosdr.tldr: The copyright licence of Instagram has significantly changed in 2013. The license you grant them is now beyond the requirements for operating the service. For instance, it includes the right for Instagram to transfer the license or to license it to others on their terms (“sublicense”).
